name: Micro Runners (alpha)
description:
Micro Runners is a PSX themed 3D racing/platformer game inspired to games like Micro Machines and Micro Maniacs.

You race into circuits filled with traps and weapons: your goal is to be the last one standing, or the fastest one!

Local multiplayer for 2 and up to 4 players (using controllers).

The game is still in early development. It currently has 1 map and 1 weapon, but I plan to add more in cycles when the gameplay loop is completed.

Inputs

Left analog - move
DualShock Cross, Xbox A: jump
DualShock Square, Xbox X: weapon

Reach 10 points to win the race!
